item.description:
... and now for something totally different!!

"Come out and celebrate May Day and the joy of spring with a colorful evening of dance!"
OK, no wisecracks about Spring in New England

A friend is performing in "Rites of Spring". This dance production will feature many of Boston's best belly dance artists performing traditional & fusion oriental dance styles.

Donâ€™t miss this unique one night only show!!

View the full event flyer

Who knows? You might even be inspired to take a class at the Johara Snake Dance Company



PLEASE BUY YOUR TICKETS BEFORE RSVPING!

TICKETS:
Adults General Admission $20 in advance

Buy on-line $20 (plus 2.50 processing fee)

$25 at the door (space willing)

Children under 10, $15/$20

Groups of 5 purchased together in advance take $10 off

For Tickets/Info Contact: Johara and Snake Dance Productions: 617-780-8890

Johara@joharasnakedance.com
www.joharasnakedance.com
item.how_to_find_us: Check out my photo. It is accurate. I'll email my cell phone number to Yes RSVP's on Sunday morning.
item.name: Last Minute Show - Rites of Spring - May Day Dance Celebration
